CheckTitle: RAM password policy require at least one symbol
Description: RAM password policies can be used to ensure password complexity. It is recommended that the password policy require at least one symbol.
Risk: Enhancing complexity of a password policy increases account resiliency against brute force logon attempts.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to RAM console. Choose Settings. In the Password section, click Modify. In the Charset section, select Symbol and click OK.
